import axios from'axios';var url='https://scales-music.herokuapp.com/';//const url = 'http://localhost:4000/';
var getUserInfo=function getUserInfo(id){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/user/info"),{id:id});};var editProfile=function editProfile(id,body){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/user/edit"),{id:id,body:body});};var addArtist=function addArtist(id,artist){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/user/add_artist"),{id:id,artist:artist});};var removeArtist=function removeArtist(id,artistId){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/user/remove_artist"),{id:id,artistId:artistId});};var destroyProfile=function destroyProfile(id){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/user/destroy"),{id:id});};export{getUserInfo,editProfile,addArtist,destroyProfile,removeArtist};
